movie.title: The Wolf of Wall Street
movie.actors: Leonardo DiCaprio, Jonah Hill, Margot Robbie, Matthew McConaughey
movie.plot: In The Wolf of Wall Street DiCaprio plays Belfort, a Long Island penny stockbroker who served 22 months in prison for defrauding investors in a massive 1990s securities scam that involved widespread corruption on Wall Street and in the corporate banking world, including shoe designer Steve Madden.
movie.awards: Nominated for 5 Oscars. Another 37 wins & 118 nominations.
movie.tomatoConsensus: Funny, self-referential, and irreverent to a fault, The Wolf of Wall Street finds Martin Scorsese and Leonardo DiCaprio at their most infectiously dynamic.
